name: Boss Duel
desc:
● At the start of the Duel, banish this card.
● Your LP becomes your starting LP x the number of your opponents.
● Remove all non-Boss Cards you own at the start of the Duel.
● At start of the Duel, return all cards in your hand to the Deck and draw the same number of cards marked Start.
● Your Deck is always arranged in the following order of marked cards:
Start=> 1=> 2=> 3
● During Standy Phase, add all cards from the Graveyard to your hand.
● You can Normal Summon any number of times.
● You cannot lose the duel due to being unable to draw
● Your cards cannot be banished, if they would be banished, destroy them instead.
● Before your opponent starts their turn, they can apply 1 of the following effects, each effect can be used once per Duel:
1. During the Battle Phase of this turn, double the ATK of all monsters you control
2. Instead of conducting your normal draw this turn, you can add 1 card from your Deck to your hand.
3. Choose 1 player, that player gains LP equal to half of the starting LP.
● If your opponent would win the Duel by an Alternate Win Condition, you take damage equal to the starting LP instead.

name: Darkness/Monster A
desc:
You can target 1 monster you control; give control of that target to 1 opponent player, then Special Summon 1 monster from 1 opponent player's Deck to your side of the field, ignoring its Summoning conditions.

-I Summon "Darkness Outsider"!-

name: Darkness/Monster B
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. When a monster declares an attack: You can Special Summon this card from your hand. Once per turn: You can choose 1 player; make that player's LP 4000. Once per turn: You can return all Spells/Traps on the field to the hand.

-I Summon "Darkness Neosphere"!-

name: Darkness/Spell A
desc:
Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by card effects. When this card is activated: Set 1 "Darkness/Trap A", "Darkness/Trap B", "Darkness/Trap C", "Darkness/Trap D" and "Darkness/Trap E" directly from your hand or Deck. The activation and effect of Continuous Traps you control cannot be negated.

-I activate "Darkness"!-

Hidden Effect
Once per turn: You can return all other Spells/Traps on the field to the hand.

name: Darkness/Trap B
desc:
Activate only by the effect of "Darkness/Trap A". Your opponent cannot activate Spells/Traps in response to this card's activation. If you control "Darkness/Trap A", apply the following effect.
● Activate the first effect of all Set "Darkness/Trap C", "Darkness/Trap D" and "Darkness/Trap E" in your Spell & Trap Zones in any order.

-I activate "Infinity"!-

name: Darkness/Trap A
desc:
Activate this card by targeting 1 Set "Darkness/Trap B" in your Spell & Trap Zones; force its activation. Your opponent cannot activate Spells/Traps in response to this card's activation.

-I activate "Zero"!-

name: Darkness/Trap C
desc:
Activate only by the effect of "Darkness/Trap B". When you activate this card: You can banish 1 card your opponent controls. Each time another "Darkness" Continuous Trap is activated, you can banish 1 card your opponent controls.

-I activate "Darkness 1"!-

name: Darkness/Trap D
desc:
Activate only by the effect of "Darkness/Trap B". When this card is activated: 1 monster you control gains 4000 ATK. Each time another "Darkness" Continuous Trap is activated, 1 monster you control gains 4000 ATK.

-I activate "Darkness 2"!-

name: Darkness/Trap E
desc:
Activate only by the effect of "Darkness/Trap B". When this card is activated: Inflict 2000 damage to 1 opponent player. Each time another "Darkness" Continuous Trap is activated, inflict 2000 damage to 1 opponent player.

-I activate "Darkness 3"!-

name: Pegasus/Monster A
desc:
If you control a "Pegasus/Spell A", this card can attack directly. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Look at your opponent's hand, choose 1 card from it, and discard it.

-I Summon "Toon Gemini Elf"!-

name: Pegasus/Monster B
desc:
If you control a "Pegasus/Spell A", this card can attack directly. When this card inflicts battle damage to your opponent: Target 1 card in either Graveyard; return that target to the hand.

-I Summon "Toon Masked Sorcerer"!-

name: Pegasus/Monster C
desc:
If you control a "Pegasus/Spell A", this card can attack directly.

-I Summon "Toon Summoned Skull"!-

name: Pegasus/Spell A
desc:
Once per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by card effects. 

-I activate "Toon World"!-

name: Pegasus/Spell C
desc:
Take control of 1 monster your opponent controls. It gains this effect.
● If you control a "Pegasus/Spell A", this card can attack directly.

-I activate "Comic Hand"!-

name: Pegasus/Monster D
desc:
Cannot be Special Summoned. Requires 1 Tribute to Normal Summon. (or Set) Up to Twice per turn: You can target 1 monster on the field or in either Graveyard; equip that target to this card. Gains ATK/DEF equal to the combined ATK/DEF of the monsters equipped to it by this effect.

-I Summon "Relinquished"!-

Hidden Effect
Cannot be destroyed by battle, also any battle damage you take from battles involving this card is also inflicted to your opponent.

name: Pegasus/Spell B
desc:
Target 1 Spell in your opponent's Graveyard; activate that target on your side of the field.

-I activate "Doppleganger"!-

name: Pegasus/Trap A
desc:
Target 1 card your opponent controls; place it on the top of your opponent's Deck.

-I activate "Toon Briefcase"!-

name: Don Thousand/Spell B
desc:
Special Summon 1 "Number 1 Token", "Number 2 Token" , "Number 3 Token" and "Number 4 Token" (ATK 2000/DEF 0). These Tokens gain this effect.
● At the end of the Damage Step, when this card battles, double the ATK of all "Number" Token Monsters you currently control.

-I activate "Numeron Calling"!-

name: Number 1 Token
desc:
Special Summoned by the effect of "Numeron Calling".
● At the end of the Damage Step, when this card battles, double the ATK of all "Number" Token Monsters you currently control.

name: Number 2 Token
desc:
Special Summoned by the effect of "Numeron Calling".

desc:

name: Number 4 Token

name: Don Thousand/Monster A
desc:
Cannot be Special Summoned. Must be Normal Summoned/Set by Tributing 1 "Number" Token Monster. Once per turn: You can Tribute all other monsters you control; inflict damage to 1 opponent equal to the combined ATK of the Tributed monsters.

-I Summon "Number C1: Numeron Chaos Gate Shunya"!-

name: Don Thousand/Spell A
desc:
Up to twice per turn, this card cannot be destroyed by card effects.

-I activate "Numeron Network"!-

Hidden Effect
If you control no other cards (Quick Effect): You can send 1 Spell/Trap from your hand or Deck to the Graveyard; as this card's effect resolution, follow the sent card's text as if you had used it.

name: Don Thousand/Spell C
desc:
If a face-up "Don Thousand/Monster A" you control is destroyed: Special Summon 1 "Don Thousand/Monster B" from your hand or Deck.

-I activate "Numeron Chaos Ritual"!-

name: Don Thousand/Monster B
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned by "Don Thousand/Spell C", and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. At the end of the Battle Phase: Destroy as many monsters your opponent controls as possible, then you can Special Summon all monsters that were destroyed by this effect to your side of the field in face-up Defense Position. If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy 1 other monster you control instead.

-I Summon "Number C1000: Numerronius"!-

name: Don Thousand/Monster C
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must be Special Summoned (from your hand) when a "Don Thousand/Monster B" you control is destroyed, and cannot be Special Summoned by other ways. Cannot be destroyed by card effects, also it cannot attack. Your opponent cannot target other monsters for an attack. During your opponent's End Phase, if they did not declare an attack this turn, they lose the Duel.

-I Summon "Number iC1000: Numerronius Numerronia"!-

name: Don Thousand/Trap A
desc:
When your opponent would Special Summon exactly 1 monster while you control no other cards: Negate the Special Summon, and if you do, destroy it, then choose 1 monster in your opponent's Deck and Special Summon it to their side of the field.

-I activate "Numeron Xyz Revision"!-

name: Don Thousand/Trap B
desc:
When your opponent activates a Spell while you control no other cards: Negate the activation, and if you do, destroy it, then choose 1 Spell in your opponent's Deck and activate it on their side of the field.

-I activate "Numeron Spell Revision"!-

name: Z-ONE/Trap A
desc:
You can activate this card from your hand. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Z-ONE" monster from your hand, except "Z-ONE/Monster E", ignoring its Summoning conditions. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Destroy all "Z-ONE" and "Timelord" monsters you control. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated.

-I activate "Nonexistence"!-

name: Z-ONE/Monster A
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. If this card is Special Summoned: Special Summon 1 "Hairon, the Timelord Token" (ATK 0/DEF 0) and 1 "Camion, the Timelord Token" (ATK 0/DEF 0). These Tokens and this card gain these effects.
● Cannot be destroyed by battle or by an opponent's card effect, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.
● At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked: Halve your opponent's LP.

-I Summon "Michion, the Timelord"!-

name: Hairon, the Timelord Token
desc:
Special Summoned by the effect of "Michion, the Timelord/Boss Duel".

desc:

desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. If this card is Special Summoned: Special Summon 1 "Zadion, the Timelord Token" (ATK 0/DEF 0) and 1 "Raphion, the Timelord Token" (ATK 0/DEF 0). These Tokens and this card gain these effects.

name: Zadion, the Timelord Token
desc:
Special Summoned by the effect of "Gabrion, the Timelord/Boss Duel".

● At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked: Shuffle all cards your opponent controls into the Deck.

name: Raphion, the Timelord Token
desc:
Special Summoned by the effect of "Gabrion, the Timelord/Boss Duel".
● Cannot be destroyed by battle or by an opponent's card effect, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.
● At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked: Shuffle all cards your opponent controls into the Deck.

name: Z-ONE/Monster D
desc:
Cannot be destroyed by battle or by an opponent's card effect, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card. At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked: Inflict 4000 damage to 1 opponent player.

-I Summon "Sandaion, the Timelord"!-

name: Z-ONE/Trap B
desc:
Activate this card by sending 1 "Z-ONE/Trap A" you control to the Graveyard. Once per turn, during your Main Phase: You can Special Summon 1 "Z-ONE" monster from your hand, except "Z-ONE/Monster E", ignoring its Summoning conditions. Once per turn, during your Standby Phase: Destroy all "Z-ONE" and "Timelord" monsters you control. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated.

-I activate "Endless Emptiness"!-

name: Z-ONE/Monster C
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. If this card is Special Summoned: Special Summon 1 "Metaion, the Timelord Token" (ATK 0/DEF 0) and 1 "Tzaphion, the Timelord Token" (ATK 0/DEF 0). These Tokens and this card gain these effects.
● Cannot be destroyed by battle or by an opponent's card effect, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.

-I Summon "Lazion, the Timelord"!-

name: Metaion, the Timelord Token
desc:
Special Summoned by the effect of "Lazion, the Timelord".
● Cannot be destroyed by battle or by an opponent's card effect, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.
● At the end of the Battle Phase, if this card attacked or was attacked: Shuffle all cards in your opponent's Graveyard into the Deck.

name: Tzaphion, the Timelord Token
desc:
Special Summoned by the effect of "Lazion, the Timelord".
● Cannot be destroyed by battle or by an opponent's card effect, also you take no battle damage from attacks involving this card.

desc:
Activate this card by sending 1 "Z-ONE/Trap B" you control to the Graveyard; Special Summon 1 "Z-ONE" monster from your hand or Deck, ignoring its Summoning conditions. This card's activation and effect cannot be negated.

-I activate "Infinite Light"!-

name: Z-ONE/Monster E
desc:
Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. The ATK of all other "Z-ONE" and "Timelord" monsters you control become 4000. The ATK of this card is equal to the combined ATK of all "Z-ONE" and "Timelord" monsters you control.

-I Summon "Sephylon, the Ultimate Timelord"!-

Hidden Effect
If this card would be destroyed, you can destroy 1 other "Z-ONE" or "Timelord" monster you control instead.

name: Command Duel
desc:
Remove this card from the Duel immediately, and if you do, if all cards you now own compose an invalid Deck, your opponent can make you lose the Duel. Otherwise, draw 1 card if this card was in your hand. If both players agree, apply the following rules.
● Activate a random Command Card at the start of each player's turn.

name: Command Duel 1
desc: Both players choose 1 card from their Decks, reveal it to their opponent and then add it to their hand.

name: Command Duel 2
desc: Both players choose 1 card from their Decks, and send it to the Graveyard.

name: Command Duel 3
desc: Both players reveal the top card of their Decks. If it's a monster, that card is added to the hand, otherwise, place it on top of the Deck.

name: Command Duel 4
desc: Both players randomly discards 1 card from their opponent's hand, then, draws 1 card.

name: Command Duel 5
desc: Both players adds the top card of their Graveyard to their hand.

name: Command Duel 6
desc: Both players chooses 1 card from their hand and places it at the bottom of the Deck, then, draw 2 cards.

name: Command Duel 7
desc: Both players can directly Set 1 Trap Card from their Deck onto the field.

name: Command Duel 8
desc: If both players have a Set card on the field, both players can destroy 1 Set card their opponent controls.

name: Command Duel 9
desc: Both players discard 1 card from their hand, and add 1 card from the Graveyard to their hand.

name: Command Duel 10
desc: Both players shuffle all cards in their hands into the Deck, then they draw an equal amount of cards.

name: Command Duel 11
desc: Both players play Rock-Paper-Scissors. The player who wins gains 2000 LP.

name: Command Duel 12
desc: Both players play Rock-Paper-Scissors. The player who wins Special Summons 1 monster from their Graveyard.

name: Command Duel 13
desc: Both players play Rock-Paper-Scissors. The player who wins draws 1 card.

name: Command Duel 14
desc: All monsters on the field are changed to face-down Defense Position. During this turn, monsters cannot change their battle positions.

name: Command Duel 15
desc: The player who has less LP than their opponent gains 2000 LP.

name: Command Duel 16
desc: Until the end of the turn, face-up FIRE and WATER monsters on the field have their original ATK doubled.

name: Command Duel 17
desc: Until the end of the turn, WATER and EARTH monsters on the field have their ATK/DEF switched.

name: Command Duel 18
desc: Until the end of the turn, face-up FIRE and WIND monsters on the field can attack twice during each Battle Phase.

name: Command Duel 19
desc: Until the end of the turn, face-up EARTH and WIND monsters on the field cannot be destroyed.

name: Command Duel 20
desc: Until the end of the turn, face-up LIGHT and DARK monsters cannot activate their effects.

name: Command Duel 21
desc: All currently face-up monsters have 0 ATK until the end of this turn.

name: Command Duel 22
desc: Detach all Xyz Materials from Xyz Monsters currently on the field.

name: Command Duel 23
desc: Return all Level 4 monsters face-up on the field to the hand.

name: Command Duel 24
desc:
Players can choose to wear their belt. Toss a coin, if Heads, players wearing a belt can apply this effect. If Tails, players not wearing a belt can apply this effect.
● You can change the Levels of all monsters you currently control, from 1 to 12.

name: Command Duel 25
desc: Players can choose to wear glasses. Toss a coin, if Heads, players wearing glasses gain 800 LP. If Tails, players not wearing glasses gain 800 LP.

name: Command Duel JP1
desc: Both players can Special Summon 1 monster from their Deck or Extra Deck that has "This card cannot be used in a Duel." written on it, ignoring their Summoning conditions.

name: Command Duel JP2
desc: Both players can Special Summon 1 monster from their Extra Deck that has "This card cannot be used in a Duel." written on it, ignoring their Summoning conditions, and if it does, that player(s) can draw 1 card.

name: Chaos End Ruler - Ruler of the Beginning and the End
desc: Cannot be Normal Summoned/Set. Must first be Special Summoned (from your hand) by banishing 1 LIGHT Warrior-Type and 1 DARK Fiend-Type monster from your Graveyard. When Special Summoned, cards and effects cannot be activated. You can pay 1000 LP; banish all cards in your opponent's hand, field, and Graveyard, then inflict 500 damage to your opponent for each card banished by this effect.

name: Dark Renewal (Anime)
desc: When your opponent Summoned a monster(s): Send 1 of those monsters and 1 monster you control to the Graveyard, and if you do, Special Summon 1 Spellcaster-Type monster from your Graveyard.

name: Level Doubler
desc: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard, then target 1 Level 4 or lower monster you control; double its Level.

name: Quick Summon
desc: Immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon/Set 1 monster.

name: Scrap Fusion
desc: While you control no monsters: Fusion Summon 1 Fusion Monster from your opponent's Extra Deck to your side of the field, by banishing Fusion Materials listed on it from your opponent's Graveyard.

name: Hyper Coat
desc: Target 1 Machine-Type monster you control with "V", "W", "X", "Y", and/or "Z" in its name; equip this card to it. It gains 500 ATK and is unaffected by your opponent's card effects. If it leaves the field, destroy this card.

name: Malefic Paradigm Shift
desc: When a "Malefic Paradox Dragon" you control is destroyed: Pay half your LP; Special Summon 1 "Malefic Truth Dragon" from your hand, Deck or Graveyard.

name: Malefic Tune (Anime)
desc: When a "Malefic" monster is destroyed by battle: Draw 2 cards.

name: Sad Story - Sorrowful Memories
desc: You cannot activate Spell Cards the turn you activate this card. When the turn player draws a card(s) during the Draw Phase: They must reveal all cards they draw, and shuffle all revealed monsters into the Deck.

name: Sad Story - Unwavering Truth
desc: You cannot activate Spell Cards the turn you activate this card. When the turn player draws a card(s) during the Draw Phase: They must reveal all cards they draw, and shuffle all revealed Spell Cards into the Deck.

name: Sad Story - Atrocious Day
desc: You cannot activate Spell Cards the turn you activate this card. When the turn player draws a card(s) during the Draw Phase: They must reveal all cards they draw, and shuffle all revealed Trap Cards into the Deck.

name: Sorrowful Chain
desc: If you control 1 "Sad Story - Sorrowful Memories", "Sad Story - Unwavering Truth", and "Sad Story - Dreadful Day": Special Summon 1 "Dragon Queen of Tragic Endings" from your hand or Deck.

name: Ojamandala
desc: Pay 1000 LP, then target 1 each of "Ojama Green", "Ojama Yellow", and "Ojama Black" in your Graveyard; Special Summon them.

name: Red-Eyes Burn (Anime)
desc: When a "Red-Eyes" monster you control is destroyed: Inflict damage to both players equal to its ATK.

name: Sowing of the Fool
desc:
Once per turn: Target 1 "Arcana Force" monster you control; note its ATK in multiples of 300 (rounded down), then toss a coin and apply an appropriate effect.
● Heads: Send cards from the top of your Deck to the Graveyard equal to that number.
● Tails: Send cards from the top of your opponent's Deck to the Graveyard equal to that number.

name: Magician's Scales
desc: Tribute 1 "Arcana Force" monster; add 1 Spell from your Deck to your hand.

name: Arcana Force XV - The Fiend
desc:
If this card is Summoned: Toss a coin and gain the appropriate effect. ● Heads: When this card attacks: Target 1 monster on the field; destroy it, then, inflict 500 damage to its controller. If that monster is not destroyed, destroy this card. ● Tails: When this card attacks: Destroy all monsters on the field.

(This card is never treated as a "V" card.)

name: Life Force
desc: If you would take battle damage, you can pay 400 LP instead.

name: Ojama Ride
desc: Discard 1 each of "Ojama Yellow", "Ojama Black" and "Ojama Green": Special Summon up to 3 Level 4 or lower Machine-Type Union monsters from your Deck in face-up Defense Position, but they cannot change their battle positions.

name: Ojama Delta Thunder!!
desc: If you control an "Ojama Green", "Ojama Yellow" and "Ojama Black": Your opponent takes 500 damage for each card in their hand and side of the field, then, you can send 1 "Ojama Delta Hurricane!!" from your hand or Deck to the Graveyard, and if you do, destroy all cards your opponent controls.

name: Dimensional Catapult
desc: Activate this card by targeting 1 "VWXYZ-Dragon Catapult Cannon" in your Graveyard; Special Summon it and equip it with this card, but its effects are negated. If it attacks a Defense Position monster, inflict piercing battle damage to your opponent. If this card leaves the field, banish the equipped monster.

name: Miracle Rupture (Anime)
desc: Send 1 Rock-Type monster from your Deck to the Graveyard, then draw 1 card.

name: ZEXAL Catapult
desc: Special Summon 1 "ZW" monster from your hand.

name: Heraldry Blast
desc: If the equipped monster is destroyed: Inflict damage to its controller equal to half of its ATK.

name: Cat Meeting
desc:
When a "Neko" or "Cat" monster is Normal Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 Level 3 or lower "Neko" or "Cat" monster from your hand.

(This card is always treated as a "Neko" card and it is never a "Cat" card.)

name: Mysterious Cat Transformation
desc:
If a "Stray Cat" you control is destroyed by battle: Special Summon 1 "Monster Cat" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard.

(This card is always treated as a "Neko" card and it is never a "Cat" card.)

name: Twin-Tail Cat Lady
desc:
3 Level 1 monsters
Once per turn: You can detach 1 Xyz Material from this card; this card gains 800 ATK.

name: Cat Food
desc: Tribute 1 "Stray Cat"; Special Summon 1 "Stray Cat Girl" from your hand, Deck, or Graveyard in face-up Attack Position.

name: Cat Confusion
desc:
When an opponent's monster declares an attack, if you control a Beast-Type monster: Return the attacking monster to the hand.

(This card is always treated as a "Neko" card and it is never a "Cat" card.)

name: Catnip Turbine
desc:
Equip only to a "Neko" or "Cat" monster you control. It gains 1200 ATK, but it cannot target monsters your opponent controls for attacks.

(This card is never treated as a "Cat" card.)

name: Bonds of Rival
desc: When the attack of a monster you control is negated: Target the attack target; equip this card to that target. Take control of the equipped monster, but it cannot attack. When that target leaves the field, destroy this card. When this card is destroyed, return control of the equipped monster to its owner.

name: Sphere Field
desc: The turn player can Xyz Summon a random "Number" monster from their Extra Deck by using 2 monsters with the same Level from their hand as Xyz Materials, ignoring its Summoning conditions, also, if it has no Xyz Materials, it is destroyed.

name: Malevolent Flash
desc: When a monster with 2000 or more ATK declares an attack: Target that monster; negate the attack, and if you do, return that target to the hand.

name: Neverending Nightmare
desc: When an opponent's monster with 2000 or more ATK declares an attack: Negate that attack, and inflict damage to your opponent equal to half that monster's ATK.

name: Infernal Sun
desc: If you control no monsters when an opponent's monster with 2000 or more ATK declares an attack: Inflict 800 damage to your opponent for each card in their hand.

name: Dice Leveler
desc: Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die. Until the End Phase, increase this card's Level by the value rolled.

name: Triple Ace
desc: Special Summon 3 Level 1 monsters with the same name from your hand.

name: Dream Dice
desc: Roll a six-sided die once; if the result is 6, the ATK of all monsters your opponent currently controls becomes 0, otherwise the ATK of all monsters you currently control becomes 0.

name: Sun Scale
desc:
Once per turn: You can roll a six-sided die; if the result is 6, destroy all monsters your opponent controls, otherwise destroy 1 monster you control. If this card is destroyed and sent to the Graveyard: Inflict 500 damage to your opponent.

(This card is always treated as a "Sky" card.)

name: Dice Crisis
desc: When an opponent's monster declares an attack: Activate this card by targeting the attacking monster; roll a six-sided die, and if the result is 6, equip this card to that target. Take control of it, also its ATK becomes 0. When this card leaves the field, return control of that target to its owner. When that monster leaves the field, destroy this card.

name: Majestic Jester
desc: At the start of the Damage Step, if this card battles an opponent's monster: Roll a six-sided die once; if the result is 6, destroy that monster, otherwise destroy this card.

name: Gimmick Puppet Princess
desc: If this card was destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard, and the monster that destroyed this card by battle is in your opponent's Graveyard: You can banish this card from your Graveyard; Special Summon that monster to your opponent's side of the field.

name: Gimmick Puppet Scarecrow
desc: If this face-up Attack Position card is targeted for an attack: Change this card to face-up Defense Position. Your opponent cannot target other face-up monsters for attacks.

name: Puppet Repair
desc: When a Level 4 or lower "Puppet" monster you control is destroyed by battle and sent to the Graveyard: Special Summon 1 monster with the same name from your Deck.

name: Attack Gimmick
desc: Target 1 "Gimmick Puppet" monster; until the End Phase, that target gains 500 ATK, and if it destroys an opponent's monster by battle, inflict damage to your opponent equal to the ATK of the destroyed monster.

● If you have no Action Cards in your hand (Quick Effect): You can activate this effect; if your opponent also has no Action Cards in their hand, they can play rock-paper-scissors with you. If a player's result is tails, they cannot activate this effect for the rest of this turn. If your opponent did not play rock-paper-scissors with you, toss a coin.  - If you have no Action Cards in your hand, you can apply this effect. If your opponent also has no Action Cards in their hand, they can play rock-paper-scissors with you. Add 1 random Action Card from outside the Duel to winning player's hand. If your opponent did not play rock-paper-scissors with you, there is a 50% chance to add 1 random Action Card from outside the Duel to your hand. Any players who was involved in this effect have a 50% chance to become unable to apply this effect for the rest of this turn.
